# alis Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    alis = {
      source  = "alis-exchange/alis"
      version = ">= 0.0.1-alpha4"
    }
  }
}

provider "alis" {
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `access_token` (String)
- `credentials` (String) A JSON string of Google Cloud credentials.
- `host` (String)
- `project` (String) The Google Cloud project ID.
